Posts.Title: My Favorite Book
Posts.Description: Picture this. Dragons, self-discovery, strength, and a smart women. Do I even need to say more?... Nope!

Posts.Title: The Art of Playing the System
Posts.Description: I understand this book is not based on actual events. However, it holds so much truth, and it highlights what women sometimes have to do to succeed. Fortunately, times have become more progressive.

Posts.Title: Read Music
Posts.Description: Let's learn how to read musical notes

Posts.Title: Win the fight
Posts.Description: Wonder how some people can always negotiate for the lowest amount? Ever wonder how they stay calm and know exactly what to say? Hereâ€™s a book that will help you win any negotiation!

Posts.Title: Harry Potter
Posts.Description: The question we should all be asking ourselves is, why? Why do so many people love this book? Is it because of its originality or its depth? The amount of time and dedication Mrs. Rowling had to put into making up so many spells didn't get me started on the world-building.
